parameters.jsCode: const communityStrategy = { brands: { primary: ['vaultoro', 'ubuntu tribe', 'utribe', 'gift token'], competitors: ['paxg', 'xaut', 'tether gold', 'usdc', 'binance', 'coinbase'] }, keywords: { goldBacked: ['gold backed crypto', 'digital gold', 'gold tokenization', 'precious metals crypto', 'gold stablecoin'], africaCrypto: ['africa crypto', 'african bitcoin', 'diaspora remittance', 'african fintech', 'ubuntu philosophy'], painPoints: ['high remittance fees', 'currency devaluation', 'inflation hedge', 'crypto volatility', 'gold storage costs', 'financial inclusion'], personas: ['gold investor', 'african crypto trader', 'diaspora saver', 'inflation hedge seeker', 'crypto gold maximalist'] }, searchQueries: { twitter: ['vaultoro OR "ubuntu tribe" OR utribe OR "gift token"', 'gold backed crypto africa', 'digital gold vs bitcoin', 'remittance crypto africa', 'inflation hedge gold crypto'], telegram: ['vaultoro', 'ubuntu tribe', 'gold backed stablecoin', 'african crypto', 'digital gold investment'] }, contentThemes: { newsletter: ['Weekly Gold-Crypto Market Analysis', 'African Crypto Adoption Stories', 'Digital Gold vs Traditional Gold'], socialPost: ['Community Wins', 'Educational Content', 'Market Insights'], seoBlogs: ['Ultimate Guide to Gold-Backed Crypto', 'Why African Markets Need Digital Gold', 'Vaultoro vs Traditional Gold Investment'], podcasts: ['Crypto Gold Expert Interviews', 'African Fintech Revolution', 'Future of Digital Precious Metals'] } }; return [{ json: communityStrategy }];

const allInputs = $input.all(); const strategy = allInputs[0]?.json || {}; const twitterData = allInputs.filter(item => item.json.data && Array.isArray(item.json.data)); const telegramData = allInputs.find(item => item.json.data && item.json.data[0]?.channel) || {}; const aggregatedData = { timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), sources: { twitter: { totalTweets: twitterData.reduce((sum, data) => sum + (data.json.data?.length || 0), 0), engagementMetrics: twitterData.flatMap(data => data.json.data || []).map(tweet => ({ likes: tweet.public_metrics?.like_count || 0, retweets: tweet.public_metrics?.retweet_count || 0, replies: tweet.public_metrics?.reply_count || 0 })) }, telegram: telegramData.json || {}, totalDataPoints: twitterData.length + 1 }, searchContext: strategy, communityInsights: { platforms: ['Twitter', 'Telegram'], focusBrands: ['Vaultoro', 'Ubuntu Tribe'], analysisType: 'crypto-native community monitoring' } }; return [{ json: aggregatedData }];

const data = $json; const prompt = `You are an expert crypto-native AI assistant specialized in community analysis for Web3 and gold-backed stablecoins. Analyze the following social media conversations from Twitter and Telegram communities focused on Vaultoro and Ubuntu Tribe. TWITTER DATA: ${JSON.stringify(data.sources.twitter, null, 2)} TELEGRAM DATA: ${JSON.stringify(data.sources.telegram, null, 2)} BUSINESS CONTEXT: - Vaultoro: Swiss-based crypto-to-gold trading platform (30k+ customers, 95+ countries) - Ubuntu Tribe: African-focused gold tokenization platform (GIFT token, remittances, financial inclusion) - Target audiences: Gold investors, African crypto traders, diaspora savers, inflation hedge seekers Please extract and provide analysis in this JSON format: { "weeklyTrendsSummary": "2-3 sentence overview of key community trends", "keyTopics": ["top 5 conversation topics with frequency"], "repeatedQuestions": ["common user questions and concerns"], "emotionalTone": { "excitement": "percentage and examples", "fear": "percentage and examples", "confusion": "percentage and examples", "hope": "percentage and examples" }, "personas": [ { "type": "persona name", "description": "detailed description", "painPoints": ["specific pain points"], "language": "how they communicate" } ], "competitorMentions": [ { "competitor": "name", "context": "how mentioned", "sentiment": "positive/negative/neutral" } ], "contentIdeas": { "newsletter": ["5 specific newsletter topics with headlines"], "socialPost": ["5 social media post ideas with suggested tone"], "seoBlog": ["5 SEO blog post titles with target keywords"], "podcastEpisode": ["5 podcast episode ideas with guest suggestions"] }, "recommendedToneAndMessaging": { "tone": "overall recommended tone (informal/authoritative/emotional/educational)", "keyMessages": ["3-5 core messages that resonate"], "languageStyle": "specific wording recommendations", "communityApproach": "how to engage with each persona" } }`; return [{ json: { prompt, analysisData: data } }];

parameters.jsCode: const aiResponse = $json.choices[0].message.content; let analysis; try { analysis = JSON.parse(aiResponse); } catch (e) { analysis = { error: 'Failed to parse AI response', rawResponse: aiResponse }; } const report = { reportDate: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], reportType: 'Bi-Weekly Crypto Community Intelligence', executiveSummary: analysis.weeklyTrendsSummary || 'Community analysis completed for Vaultoro and Ubuntu Tribe social channels.', insights: analysis, platforms: ['Twitter', 'Telegram'], focusBrands: ['Vaultoro', 'Ubuntu Tribe'], dataQuality: { sourcesAnalyzed: 2, totalEngagements: 'Variable based on community activity', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }, actionableItems: analysis.contentIdeas || {}, nextSteps: [ 'Review content ideas for marketing team', 'Implement persona-specific messaging', 'Monitor competitor mentions', 'Engage with identified community questions' ] }; return [{ json: report }];
